name: UpdateEnterpriseGroupInfo
description:
Replace all information for a provisioned enterprise group.

Use this tool to replace an existing provisioned group's information entirely. All details must be provided anew, as any missing information will result in its removal, including membership. For partial updates, a different endpoint should be used.

parameters.name: scim_group_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the SCIM group to update. This is necessary for identifying the specific group to replace its information.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier of the SCIM group.

parameters.name: group_information_payload
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the details of the provisioned group, including displayName, externalId, members, and schemas.

displayName.description: A human-readable name for a security group.

externalId.description: A unique identifier for the resource as defined by the provisioning client.

displayName.description: The display name associated with the member

value.description: The local unique identifier for the member

schemas.description: The URIs that are used to indicate the namespaces of the SCIM schemas.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: scim_group_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier of the SCIM group.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier of the SCIM group.

displayName.description: A human-readable name for a security group.

externalId.description: A unique identifier for the resource as defined by the provisioning client.

displayName.description: The display name associated with the member

value.description: The local unique identifier for the member

schemas.description: The URIs that are used to indicate the namespaces of the SCIM schemas.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
